pr_title: Fix failure in JDBC when TIME nanos overflow

timeline.author: findepi

timeline.message: Separate TIME and TIME WITH TIME ZONE test cases

Fix failure in JDBC when TIME nanos overflow

`ResultSet.getTime` no longer fails. The actual semantics (rounding or
truncation) is pre-existing and is still to be determined.

Fix failure in JDBC when TIME nanos overflow
